name: The garden (itch) (astery, TakeThat)
description:
First person 7x7 rouge-like game. We made it! Me and @takethat doing it for two weeks - for minimal resolution and maximum capabilities. And sleepless final night. Game is very basic, I love it just for animation of the only one foe.

If you interested here is sources.

Music by Mark Sparling

Feel free to leave a comment!

P.S.: If you have complains about missing libs unpack this in folder with game. We don't want violate rules, this archive contain only sdl libraries.
